Control Name: REL 13.4 Manage conﬁguration drift at the DR site or region
Control Statement: Ensure that the infrastructure, data, and conﬁguration are as needed at the DR site or region. For example, check that AMIs and service quotas are up to date.

control_attributes.Control: REL 13.4 Manage conﬁguration drift at the DR site or region
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you plan for disaster recovery (DR)?
